title: New: Sorcha Richardson – Lost
body:
Most songs about heartbreak stem from the perspective of the distraught, hence it being all the more refreshing to hear a track written with the intention of cheering up a friend who has just gone through a rough break-up.

**Sorcha Richardson’s** latest, _Lost_, toes the lines between endearingly honest and destructively cheesy, managing to come across as admirably authentic – an ode to a friend struggling to realise that their life is so much more than just one person. We’ve all been there, it can suck, and Lost might just be the perfect remedy. _It’s okay to be this way but we don’t have to be forever. _Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
